This is fine for watching on a computer but the decision to use:
1. 25fps
2. Audio sampling rate of 44.1 KHz

makes this un-playable & un-listenable on dlna (dma) supported samsung tv's. On TivX the audio doesn't work either.

Otherwise, it's pretty good watching on a small laptop by yourself.
